## Uploading files to SAGE

Please note that 'ppt' extension files are not compatible with SAGE. It should be in pdf format. To upload a pdf, one can simply drag the pdf to the SAGE board. One can also follow the steps below to upload files.

- Right click on a blank space on the SAGE screen and select "Assets"
![](images/assets.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
- Click "Upload"
![](images/uploadassets.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
- Next, choose the file you want to upload and click "Upload".
![](images/choosefiles.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
- After a few seconds, you will see the file in the "Assets" folder. Simply double click the file to display it on the screen.
![](images/upload3.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
- You will now see the pdf on the screen.
![](images/uploadedfile.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}


## Downloading files from SAGE

To download any uploaded file, as before navigate to the "Assets" folder. Select the file you want to download and click download.
![](images/downloadfile.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
